channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3057] A Statement from Matt and Trey on last nights South Park
item.description: In the 14 years we've been doing South Park we have never done a show that we couldn't stand behind. We delivered our version of the show to Comedy Central and they made a determination to alter the episode. It wasn't some meta-joke on our part. Comedy Central added the bleeps. In fact, Kyle's customary final speech was about

item.title: [+2337] Anderson Cooper humiliates Arizona birther legislator
item.description: Anderson Cooper's interview with Arizona Republican StateRepresentative Cecil Ash does a great job of showing just how vacuous and deceitful the birthers really are.

item.title: [+2197] Magic: “Eyjafjallajökull” Card [PIC]
[+1705] Courage is stronger than weapons (PIC)
item.description: Courage Comes From Faith"Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the Lord thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest."(Joshua 1:9)

item.title: [+1701] Don't Question: Just Do It
item.description: Seriously, what are you waiting for? Just do it already.

item.title: [+1683] Jay Leno's Ratings Fall Below Conan's on "The Tonight Show"
item.description: Jay Leno's ratings have dipped to the level Conan's were at when NBC replaced him. Uh-oh, NBC.

item.title: [+1637] Job seeker, 21, kills herself after 200 job rejections
item.description: A young woman who left school with three A-levels and ten GCSEs killed herself because she felt 'humiliated' about not getting a job. Vicky Harrison, 21, took a massive drug overdose a day after receiving a rejection letter following an interview. She left a suicide note saying: 'I don't want to be me anymore.'

item.title: [+1512] The Most Badass the Mushroom Kingdom has Ever Looked (PIC)
item.description: I had seen the Mario and Luigi pictured here before, but the artist (lastscionz) must have decided to go back and take it to a new level with the baddies and peach. Good lord, I never though Mario enemies could be so terrifying. Look at that Goomba. For reference THIS is what a Goomba is supposed to look like.

item.title: [+1402] How to Delete Facebook Applications (and Why You Should)
item.description: At Facebook's f8 conference, founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg announced that the company was removing restrictions on user data retention within Facebook applications.

item.title: [+1393] Ten Reasons Why You Should Not Date a Girl Gamer
item.description: There was recently an article written about why it's a good thing to date or marry a girl who plays video games. Being the chauvinistic pig that I am, I thought it was only fair to write an article listing the top 10 reasons it would be a negative thing to date a female gamer

item.title: [+1219] 99 year-old loves her first computer -- an iPad (with Video)
item.description: Virginia Campbell, a 99-year-old woman from Lake Oswego, has finally bought her first computer -- an Apple iPad. "It's changed her life," one of her daughters told OregonLive.com. Virginia has been an avid reader most of her life, but she suffers from glaucoma, making reading increasingly difficult.

item.title: [+1068] xkcd: Desert Island
item.description: Telescopes and bathyscapes and sonar probes of Scottish lakes, Tacoma Narrows bridge collapse explained with abstract phase-space maps, some x-ray slides, a music score, Minard's Napoleonic war: the most exciting new frontier is charting what's already here.

item.title: [+825] Happy Earth Day - NYPD trashes 100s of bikes for Obama visit
item.description: Citing security concerns that bikes might be secret pipe bombs, NYPD officers clipped the locks of hundreds of bikes along Houston Street this morning in preparation for President Obama's speech at Cooper Union. The bikes were unceremoniously put in the back of the truck. There was no prior notification of the bikes needing to be cleared along the

item.title: [+747] North Korean torpedo sank Cheonan
item.description: Military intelligence confirms sinking of navy corvette by North Korean submarine

item.title: [+706] The greatest nature photographs of all time
item.description: A collection of 40 nature images, including dancing polar bears, tortoises gathered at dawn and a thresher shark caught in a fishing net will be sold in New York to mark Earth Day.

item.title: [+666] So Cute Little Birds !
[+653] White Bank Robber Fools Cops With Black Guy Mask (w/ pic)
item.description: Ohio police say they've apprehended a wily white bank robber who threw them off the trail by disguising himself as a black person. Authorities say 30-year-old Conrad Zdzierak would rob the banks in a high-quality mask, then take it off as he drove to his next robbery target, confounding police on the lookout for a black man.

item.title: [+629] Dying boy, 8, Denied Ambulance Because He Wasn't ill Enough.
item.description: A dying schoolboy was refused an ambulance by 999 operators who said he was not ill enough. Louis Austin was passed on to an out-of-hours doctor who wrongly diagnosed swine flu over the phone and prescribed Tamiflu. He died two days later after kidney failure caused by undiagnosed diabetes.

item.title: [+626] Just the right moment (COMIC)
[+584] Gizmodo "Leaks" Another Prized Apple Product [Video]
item.description: After leaking the iPhone 4, Gizmodo continues their sleuthing. Featuring Craig Rowin as Greg Lowen.
